definitions.title: n.pr.fl.
definitions.body: Ulai, Eulaeus (As. Ulâi, cf. Dl:Pa 329 Gr. Eu)laiov) only [[אוּלָָי]], river of Elam Da 8:2, Da 8:16; = (at least in lower part) mod. Karûn (old Pasitigris) v. Dl:Pa 177. 189. 329; in upper part perh. also = mod. Kerkhah (= Choaspes), which. was formerly connected with Karûn not far from Susa (Loftus:Trav. & Researches, 423 ff Schaff-Herz.:iii. 2178, art. Shushan).
